mapper.select: set @location = POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}); select p.postIdx, u.userIdx, u.profileImage, group_concat(pi.image) postImageList, p.location, p.content, case when st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) < 1000 then concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)), 2), 'm') else concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) * 0.001 , 2), 'km') end as distance from Post p join PostImage pi on pi.postIdx = p.postIdx join UserInfo u on u.userIdx = p.userIdx where st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) < 10000 #5km 미만만 보여줌 group by p.postIdx
